name: Duck Tank's Bad Beak Day
description:
CONTROLS: Left and Right arrow keys to move, up arrow key to jump.

Oh no, poor duck tank has had their webbed tracks busted up and their laser beak is on the fritz.  Help them try to get home in this sorta uncomfortable platformer.

The theme for this game jam is "Out of control".  So I took control out of the player by removing the smooth movement that one would normally expect in a platformer. I also took out the direct control the player has over the laser by tying it with the movement.

Note: This is my first game jam, so I mostly value feedback and would greatly appreciate it if you were to send it my way.
